node.display_long_description:
1.06 Update - 02/11/21

Welcome to Solaris Offworld Combat--a fast-paced, multiplayer shooter that drops you straight into intense action. Suit up, log in & game on--you’re about to jump into 4v4 match-ups, where you’ll run, sprint & slide your way across arenas, picking up weapons & items to eliminate your opponents. Coordinate with your team to defeat your rivals & take over the Control Point to win the match! 

Includes:
6 Maps
Varieties of Weapons
An Assortment of Utilities
Multiple Cosmetics to personalize your Athlon!

nodes.title: Solaris Update - Patch 1.06
nodes.body_text:
Hello Athlons!

Shabs here, hope everyone is doing well and staying safe. I’m happy to announce that our latest update is now live.

Squad up and hop in the all new Pre-Match Warm Up Lobby, where you can explore the map, chat with your teammates, pick up weapons, and practice ejecting your opponents. In addition to that, we’ve also implemented a system underneath that will start matches a few minutes after 4 players join. This means you won't be waiting too long to start a match, even if the player count happens to be less than 8. Now don’t forget, this is just the first iteration and you will continue to see updates and improvements as we evolve with your feedback.

On top of that, you will also be able to communicate with your squadmates while in the squad menu thanks to the addition of Vivox communications (another area where you will see more improvements over time). We’ve also removed Vortex Prime from map rotation and we tuned the Shotgun so it still packs quite the punch at close to medium range, but is no longer as effective at long range encounters. We believe it feels a lot better as a CQB weapon now, but as always, we’ll be listening and watching for your feedback.

1.06 Update:
￭ Pre-Match Social Lobby
￭ Minimum player requirement for starting matches reduced to 4
￭ Shotgun balance adjustments
￭ Vortex Prime removed from map rotation
￭ Improved VOIP System
￭ Bug Fixes & General Improvements

Thanks for playing, and if you run into any issues please send us a support Ticket. If you want to stay in the know on everything Solaris, make sure to subscribe to our YouTube. If you really wanna get involved, feel free to join our Discord or Facebook group. Lastly, if you just want live updates, follow us on Twitter!

See you all online!
Shabs

node.reviewDescription: Don’t get me wrong, this game’s mechanics and gameplay are really great overall. The only thing that troubles me in the game is the amount of players in the game. The game takes so long to actually find a game. When it actually finds one, the lobby is so empty. Once more people play, I’m pretty sure it’ll make the game more fun. One thing to fix this for now is for the game developers to add game AIs. This would make the load times slower and instead play against bots instead of waiting 5 years. Also if you guys do decide to make Ais, make a singleplayer/co-op mode vs AI. Would be super helpful if you guys added this.

developerResponse.body: Thanks for the review, we have a lot of great plans for the future! Crossplay is on the road, and will make a huge difference!
